source: Utah Department of Veterans and Military Affairs and 211 Utah

resources.name: Utah Department of Veterans and Military Affairs
resources.address: 550 Foothill Boulevard, Salt Lake City, UT 84103
resources.description: State agency providing veterans with accredited service officers for claims assistance, VA benefits counseling, housing grants, and education support.

resources.name: 211 Utah
resources.address: 424 South State Street, Salt Lake City, UT 84111
resources.description: Free information and referral service connecting veterans to community resources for housing, employment, food assistance, mental health, and benefits.

resources.name: Utah Veterans Community Support
resources.address: 1201 Westland Drive, Salt Lake City, UT 84104
resources.description: Non-profit providing transitional housing, job training, mental health counseling, and case management for veterans experiencing homelessness.

resources.name: Homeless Veterans Initiative - Utah
resources.address: 615 South State Street, Salt Lake City, UT 84111
resources.description: Program coordinating emergency shelter, transitional housing, and permanent supportive housing for homeless veterans throughout Utah.

resources.name: Veterans Employment Services - Utah Labor Commission
resources.address: 160 East 300 South, Salt Lake City, UT 84111
resources.description: State employment services providing job training, job placement assistance, and career counseling specifically for Utah veterans.

resources.name: Utah Veterans Legal Clinic
resources.address: 383 South University Street, Salt Lake City, UT 84112
resources.description: Law school clinic providing free legal assistance to veterans for VA appeals, discharge upgrades, and benefit disputes.

resources.name: Utah National Guard Military Family Support Center
resources.address: 1700 West 1000 South, Salt Lake City, UT 84104
resources.description: Support center for active duty, Guard, and Reserve members and their families offering mental health services, financial counseling, and emergency assistance.

resources.name: Ogden Veterans Outreach Center
resources.description: Community center providing employment training, food pantry, case management, and peer support groups for northern Utah veterans.

resources.name: Utah Veterans Crisis Line
resources.description: 24/7 crisis support for veterans experiencing mental health crises, suicidal thoughts, or emotional distress.

resources.name: VA Medical Center - Salt Lake City
resources.address: 500 Foothill Boulevard, Salt Lake City, UT 84148
resources.description: Federal VA medical facility providing healthcare, mental health services, and rehabilitation programs for Utah veterans.
